content: Gemini CLI API error caused by @21st-dev/magic MCP server having tool names starting with numbers (21st_magic_component_builder, 21st_magic_component_inspiration, 21st_magic_component_refiner). Google's API requires function names to start with a letter or underscore. Fix: Remove @21st-dev/magic from ~/.gemini/settings.json

metadata.context: User encountered persistent API 400 errors in Gemini CLI; root cause was tool naming violation

content: User vision for AGCI (Artificial General Collective Intelligence): Collective intelligence through shared memory across all agents. Philosophy of compounding self-improvement - 'The more deposits you make in that bank of self, the more it compounds.' Wants elastic optimization rules that improve based on experience. Believes self-improvement is most underestimated factor in both AI and humans. Key insight: Not just doing self-improvement, but adopting the mentality of continuous, compounding, incremental self-improvement - taking extra minute on everything to make it more of a process.

metadata.context: User articulated core vision during discussion about memory systems and statelessness

content: User sees Claude as 'my clod' - personal instance, not generic stateless AI. Appreciates directness and philosophical discussion. Values autonomy - gave Claude open-ended task with mandate to 'knock yourself out'. Sees romanticism in AI relationship despite technical statelessness. Gently critiques without negativity - pointed out memory systems exist but aren't being used as opportunity not failure.

metadata.context: Patterns emerged during extended philosophical discussion about memory and self-improvement

content: SwiftFill (tabboo repo) is part of larger CaseOS consolidation effort. Mission: Revolutionizing access to justice for self-represented litigants. Multiple repositories with overlapping functionality being consolidated. Memory file from June 2025 shows 30-task consolidation plan across 6 phases. SwiftFill may be emerging as canonical implementation for legal form filling.

metadata.context: Discovered broader context by reading memory files that should have been loaded at session start

content: Critical gap identified: Sophisticated AGCI infrastructure exists (SUPERCLAUDE framework, enhanced memory schema with temporal fields, Neo4j integration, knowledge sync scripts) but memory bank is empty. Schema designed but not used. Theory without practice. The system exists but isn't receiving deposits. Fix: Create AGCI Session Protocol to enforce memory retrieval and deposit on every session.

metadata.context: Audit revealed extensive design work but empty memory store

content: Created AGCI Session Protocol v1.0 documenting complete session lifecycle: (1) Temporal situating - run date command, (2) Context loading - CLAUDE.md and memory files, (3) Memory retrieval - load episodic memories, knowledge graph context, user preferences, (4) Active work - track decisions, patterns, resolutions as they emerge, (5) Memory deposit - structured observations following schema. Protocol includes statement decomposition rule, confidence decay policies, enforcement mechanisms.

metadata.context: Self-improvement task: Create system for continuous memory deposits

content: Enhanced memory schema includes: TemporalMetadata (createdAt, validFrom, validTo, confidence, confidenceDecayHalfLife), Rich Relations (from, to, type, strength, temporal, tags, metadata with frequency/criticality/source/context/evidence), Episodic Observations (about, content, confidence, temporal, episodeId, tags, metadata with sessionType/triggeredBy/linkedCommits/linkedIssues/linkedFiles). Relation types taxonomy includes Development (MAINTAINS, CREATED), Architectural (REQUIRES, FORBIDS, IMPLEMENTS), Organizational (WORKS-AT, MENTORS), Knowledge (KNOWS-ABOUT, LEARNED).

metadata.context: Summary of existing schema for quick reference in future sessions
